sentence.Network_en: Town gardens are ideal because they produce flowers nearly all year round.
sentence.Network_cn: 城市公园是理想去处，那里几乎一年四季鲜花盛开。

sentence.Network_en: Drinking and driving is a problem all the year round.
sentence.Network_cn: 酒后驾车是个常年存在的问题。

sentence.Network_en: It's a treat to be enjoyed all the year round.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是全年都能享受到的款待。

entry.def: Year-round is used to describe something that happens, exists, or is done throughout the year.

example.ex: Cuba has a tropical climate with year-round sunshine.
example.tran: 古巴属于热带气候，终年阳光明媚。

means.word_mean: 1. operating or continuing throughout the year;

auth_sentence.content: Here some rain can occur all the year round.
